entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
